name: Albion Innovations
overview:
Albion Innovations is a global firm specialising in management services for early stage companies and their investors.

Albion provides a global approach to serving its clients across multiple technology sectors. With a presence in the US and Europe, Albion provides an integrated process to deliver its advisory services. A key outcome of our advisory service is risk reduction by keeping the entrepreneur focused on the technology whilst we keep the company on track.

Complementing our extensive development and transaction skills is our deep technology domain knowledge that directly benefits each client engagement. Albion’s client teams are comprised of professionals with extensive product development, regulatory and start-up experience who have executed transactions throughout Europe, North America and Asia.

Albion works on behalf of investors to make the most of the cash invested in start-up companies.
